page.title: 12SELSEY NURSING HOMES PART 1
page.content: In Selsey there are a lot of {nursing homes. Sick people}come to stay here because there are a lot of big houses that can be made into nursing homes.A nursing home is for sick people who need a lot of care and attention.Their{ages}range from{ {48 to 104}years.The home we visited has a maximum of 23 residents.Some people have to share a room as there are only 14 rooms.They have a bell in their room so that if they want anything they can press it and a nurse will come.The residents bring their own belongings to go in their room.The residents are{mostly permanent}.Some come from{Selsey},but most come from the{North country}.It costs{Â£160}a week which includes everything except newspapers, hairdresser and sweets.
